title: Christopher Walken in Film; Some of the actor's works.
text:
In 'Joe Dirt' (2001), Mr. Walken played a gangster in the witness protection program.

Mr. Walken, right, as an eccentric film director in 'America's Sweethearts' (2001).

In 'Catch Me If You Can' (2002), Mr. Walken, left, with Leonardo DiCaprio.

Glenn Close with Mr. Walken in 'The Stepford Wives' (2004).

Mr. Walken and Adam Sandler in 'Click' (2006).

Mr. Walken and John Travolta, as Edna Turnblad, in 'Hairspray' (2007).

Mr. Walken as Feng in 'Balls of Fury' (2007).

John Turturro, left, with Mr. Walken in Apple TV+'s new sci-fi series 'Severance.'

Christopher Walken in Film
